mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.ho.repository.HO03050Repository.getCcmList */ SELECT A.CAREFACILITY_DIV, A.APPLY_DATE, A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV, A.LIMIT_AMT, A.G_PAYAMT, A.L_PAYAMT, A.N_PAYAMT, A.M_PAYAMT, A.REMARK, A.USE_YN FROM CODE_CAREAMT A ORDER BY A.CAREFACILITY_DIV, A.APPLY_DATE, A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV
